title: A New England Nun - The images suggest that

content.prompt: The images in the first three sentences of the final paragraph suggest that

choices.label: Louisa envisions her future as bleak and uneventful
Lily had effectively isolated Louisa from community life
Joe had abandoned both Lily and Louisa and left the region
Louisa had been quite troubled by the prospect of matrimony

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
